thread.title: President Barack Obama Offers Kanye West Advice, West Performs at DNC Fundraiser
thread.title_full: President Barack Obama Offers Kanye West Advice, West Performs at DNC Fundraiser - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: President Barack Obama Offers Kanye West Advice, West Performs at DNC Fundraiser
text:
Today, Kanye West performed at a Democratic National Committee event in San Francisco. Before he came out, he was roasted by the Leader of the Free World himself, President Barack Obama . Watch the president roast West about his political ambitions, album titles, and Kardashian connections below. Watch footage from West's set here and here (via Consequence of Sound).
The fundraiser was billed as "an afternoon concert" that was hosted at the Warfield—a 2,300 seat venue—with tickets selling for between $250 and $10,000.
[CITE: https://www.facebook.com/abc7news/videos/10153703296472079/]
During today’s DNC fundraiser in San Francisco, President Obama offered three pro tips to Kanye West, who recently said he wanted to run for president. Details here: http://abc7ne.ws/1R4grE6CLICK LIKE if this video made you laugh.
Posted by ABC7 News on Saturday, October 10, 2015 »
